alert.note: Alert for Coastal Ocean; Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 9:47AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Ocean County through 1030 AM EDT... At 947 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Beachwood, or 10 miles south of Toms River, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Toms River, Barnegat, Beachwood, Seaside Heights, Mantoloking, Bamber Lake, Dover Beaches North, Dover Beaches South, Holiday City South, South Toms River, Island Heights, Gilford Park, Holiday Heights, Waretown and Ocean Acres. This includes Garden State Parkway between mile markers 66 and 82. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
